snap = Gadget2Snapshot()
snap.setPositions(np.ones((1, 3), dtype=np.float32) * 120.0 * u.Mpc)
snap.weights = np.ones(1, dtype=np.float32)
snap.virial_radius = np.array([200.0]) * u.Mpc
snap.concentration = np.array([1.0])
snap.setHeaderInfo(box_size=240.0 * u.Mpc)
p, b, n = snap.cutPlaneGaussianGrid(center=120.0 * u.Mpc, thickness=240.0 *
    u.Mpc, plane_resolution=256, thickness_resolution=1, left_corner=np.
    zeros(3) * u.Mpc)
pln = PotentialPlane(p / p.max(), snap.header['box_size'],
    comoving_distance=snap.header['comoving_distance'], unit=None,
    num_particles=n)
pln.visualize(colorbar=True)
pln.savefig('nfw.png')
